DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the therapeutic efficacy and safety of DSXS compared to a Placebo (vehicle) in patients with mild to moderate plaque psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of DSXS in Patients With Mild to Moderate Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate the therapeutic efficacy and safety of dsxs topical spray, 0.15% (Taro Pharmaceuticals, U.S.A., Inc.) compared to a Placebo (vehicle) spray (Taro Pharmaceuticals, U.S.A., Inc.) in patients with mild to moderate plaque psoriasis.
DOC.criteria: male and nonpregnant females, 12 years of age or older, with a confirmed diagnosis of mild to moderate plaque psoriasis patient is< 12 years old.
